string.text: Note scrawled on the back of a fuel invoice. \n \n "Give me my shooter back, you prick! I know you're an old man but I've seen government workers faster than you! How long can it take to restore one gun?"

Note scrawled on the back of a shipment manifest page. \n \n "I told you man, you need to wipe the dirt off every now and then! The receiver needs to be replaced because the inside is all scratched! You clean your gear like you clean your ass, which is to say, never at all!"

Note scrawled on the back of a lab notebook back cover. \n \n "Come on man, hurry the fuck up, I got a buyer! You trying to put me out of business? How else am I going to pay you back if I can't keep my lights on?"
Old receipt. There is a crude image drawn on it.
